info.name: LMS Complete API Collection
info.description: All 21 API modules with smart authentication and auto-saved variables

item.name: Auth Module
item.description: Authentication endpoints - Login, Register, Password management

item.name: User Module
item.description: User management - Profile, Students, Tutors, Admin operations

item.name: Subject Module
item.description: Subject management - CRUD operations for subjects

item.name: Tutor Application Module
item.description: Tutor application process - Submit, Review, Approve/Reject

item.name: Interview Slot Module
item.description: Interview scheduling - Create slots, Book, Reschedule

item.name: Trial Request Module
item.description: Trial session requests - Create, Accept, Extend, Cancel

item.name: Session Request Module
item.description: Session requests from students to tutors

item.name: Session Module
item.description: Tutoring sessions - Propose, Accept, Reschedule, Cancel, Complete

item.name: Subscription Module
item.description: Student subscription plans - Subscribe, Cancel, View

item.name: Monthly Billing Module
item.description: Monthly billing for students - Generate, View, Mark as Paid

item.name: Tutor Earnings Module
item.description: Tutor earnings and payouts - Generate, View, Initiate Payout

item.name: Chat Module
item.description: Chat management - Create chats, Get conversations

item.name: Message Module
item.description: Messaging - Send messages, Get messages, Mark as read

formdata.value: Hello, this is a test message!

item.name: Payment Module
item.description: Payment processing - Stripe integration, Refunds, History

item.name: Notification Module
item.description: Notifications - Get, Mark as read

item.name: PATCH - Admin Mark All as Read
Bookmark Module
item.description: Bookmarks - Toggle, Get my bookmarks

item.name: Review Module
item.description: Session reviews - Create, Update, Get tutor reviews

body.raw:
{
  "sessionId": "{{sessionId}}",
  "overallRating": 5,
  "teachingQuality": 5,
  "communication": 5,
  "punctuality": 5,
  "preparedness": 5,
  "comment": "Excellent tutor! Very helpful and patient.",
  "wouldRecommend": true,
  "isPublic": true
}

item.name: Tutor Feedback Module
item.description: Tutor feedback on sessions - Submit, Get pending, Get received

body.raw:
{
  "sessionId": "{{sessionId}}",
  "studentEngagement": 5,
  "topicsCovered": ["Algebra basics", "Quadratic equations"],
  "progressNotes": "Student showed good understanding of the concepts",
  "areasForImprovement": "Practice more problem-solving",
  "homeworkAssigned": "Complete exercises 1-10 on page 42",
  "nextSessionRecommendation": "Focus on advanced equations"
}

item.name: Call Module
item.description: Video/Audio calls - Initiate, Accept, Reject, End

item.name: Whiteboard Module
item.description: Collaborative whiteboard - Create rooms, Get snapshots

item.name: Admin Module
item.description: Admin dashboard - Stats, Reports, Exports
